summary: VEHICLE KEEPS SHIFTING IN AND OUT OF GEAR WITH THE AISIAN TRANSMISSION.SOME TIMES THE PRINDLE WILL SHOW ALL COLORS OR JUST DROP FROM GREEN AND BE ALL CLEAR.THIS ONLY HAPPENS DURING THE WINTER MONTHS. THE VEHICLE HAS BEEN TO DEALERS NUMEROUS TIMES FOR THIS.  TCM REFLASHED, TRANS RANGE SENSOR INSTALLED, WIRING HARNESS, INTERNAL WIRING HARNESS, VALVE BODY ETC. THIS ONLY HAPPENS WHEN DRIVING. I PROVIDE SNOW REMOVAL SERVICES HERE IN THE NORTHEAST
